title: Announcement, Collage and Variations, 1986
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue across upper right quadrant: Juried by Peter Glendinning/ COLOR PHOTOGRAPHY/ UPPER GALLERY; center, left, from upper third of sheet to lower edge: Lucille Abramson/ Dorothy Albert/...[lists participating artists]... Marsha Wright; across lower third of sheet: Curated by Mary Jane Bigler/ CollAgE*/ AND VARIATIONS/ DETROIT ARTISTS MARKET/ OCTOBER 17-NOVEMBER 14 1986/ OPENNG RECEPTION/ FRIDAY OCTOBER 17/ 5-7:30 PM
Verso: Imprinted in blue across upper third of sheet: Co-sponsored by Michigan Friends of Photography EDUCATIONAL EVENT: slide lecture by Peter Giendinning "Color Photography/ SUNDAY OCTOBER 19, 3 PM/ Detroit Artists Market EDUCATIONAL EVENT: Slide lecture by Hope Palmer "Collage"/ THURSDAY OCTOBER 23 7:30 PM; across center: ol/lgea/ c; across lower left quadrant: detroit artists market/ 1452/ randolph/ street/ detroit/ michigan/ 48226/ telephone/ 313/ 962 0337; across lower right quadrant: Non-Profit/ Organization/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Permit No. 5578/ Detroit, Michigan

* "AND VARIATIONS... PM" form the word "CollAge."
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in blue for Detroit Artists Market exhibition, designed to be mailed.  Text in a variety of sizes, styles throughout.  
Recto: Across upper right quadrant, text giving juror and additional information.  Across lower third of sheet, text giving exhibition title, dates, reception and additonal information.  Center left, from upper third of sheet to lower edge, text giving participating artists.    Verso:  Across upper third of sheet, text giving sponsors, dates, and additional information.  Across center, letters of "collage" scattered.  Across lower third of sheet, in two text blocks, mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Collage and Variations, 1986. Offset lithograph on pink paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-40
